Hi, I'm Owen,

I live in London, working as a programmer at a startup using a mixture of Java and Ruby. I'm currently finishing up my PhD at Southampton University, where I also obtained a masters in computer science.

Outside of work I enjoy programming in Haskell, and ignoring technical things my hobbies and interests include windsurfing, playing waterpolo, skiing, playing the electric guitar, and watching MotoGP & F1.

If you'd like to say hi, feel free to do so via email: owen@owenstephens.co.uk.

Owen Stephens 2015
